title: Get up to $7,000 Bonus on Your First Deposit at PrimeXBT
content: New PrimeXBT customers will get 7% of their first deposit up to $7,000Â credited to their account as a bonus that can be used as additional collateral to open positions.

Available for two weeks after activation, this bonus will be the boost you need to get the hang of trading quickly and efficiently with much of the usual hassle removed, while maximizing your gains beyond what you thought was possible.
When you first sign up with PrimeXBT and make your deposit, enter the code CRYPTONEWS7000 in the promo section. You will then find your bonus – up to $7,000 – as a reward in your trading account.

Keep in mind that withdrawing any amount from your trading account to your wallet will void the bonus before its expiration a month after activation. Your best bet is to use it to its fullest extent, withdrawing only when you deem the margin sufficient and are comfortable trading without the bonus.

A key advantage of this offer is that in case you lose money and your balance goes into negative digits, you can continue trading as long as your negative balance does not exceed the bonus amount. If this happens, the bonus is considered spent and the account’s balance will be cleared to 0.
This means your loss potential is also significantly decreased, as it won’t hurt you as much as it would if you were solely using your own funds to trade.

Ready to start maximizing your profits? Head over to PrimeXBT, sign up, enter the code CRYPTONEWS7000 in the promo section, and make your first deposit. The more generous it is, the bigger your bonus will be!
Remember: don’t invest more than you’re willing to lose and happy trading!
